Topic.Title: New game Don't have a name for it yet.

Posts.EditableText: This is a game that has tinies and giantesses and you can soon play in the POV of any character you want. I have teleporters they are still kind of a WIP. If you are downloading this to play on quest. Make sure to go the Google Drive link provided and download the .mp3 file. If you do not have this file then the game will not make quite as much sense: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MdsInYYxU_QuF0oU57DjjvMP4jIFTEiY?usp=sharing I'm sorry for making a bad game and will try to fix it and make it better. However I cannot fix it if I don't know what I need to fix. I had to make generate a new Game ID because it would not let me edit it online. I hope this did this did not mess up any save files but if it did I'm so sorry. Also I have made it so that should you put on panties/pants while controlling the guest. That then you have to use the teleporters to get in out of the vagina until you take them off. Please comment suggestions on what you think this game should be called. Link: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ochibdyoukglkbheugelzg/dont-know-yet
